bibl.title: Callimachus and the Contemporary Historical 'Epic'.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Ancient narrative elegies. - From the Persians to the Galatians. - Callimachus and Philadelphus' 'Victory' over the Galatians. - Conclusions. Callimachus and the historical elegy.
BARBANTANI Silvia, Callimachus and the Contemporary Historical 'Epic'.
Steven JACKSON and Damien NELIS (Edd.), Studies in Hellenistic Poetry = Hermathena 173-174 (2002-2003) pp. 29-47.
